CustomField.formula: AND( NOT( AND( X5th_Month__c = 0, X6th_Month__c = 0 ) ), ( IF(X1st_Month__c > 0, 1, 0) + IF(X2nd_Month__c > 0, 1, 0) + IF(X3rd_Month__c > 0, 1, 0) + IF(X4th_Month__c > 0, 1, 0) + IF(X5th_Month__c > 0, 1, 0) + IF(X6th_Month__c > 0, 1, 0) ) >= 4 )
CustomField.label: Qualified For MSL
